results.name: Distance from the n-th triangular number to the nearest square.
comment: The maximum of a(n)/n appears to converge to sqrt(2)/2 (A010503), i.e. n*(n+1)/2 seems not more than n*sqrt(2)/2 distant from a square.
Some values don't seem to be in the sequence (checked up to n=10^7): 7,18,23,31,37,38...
Those values k are not in the sequence because the Pell-type equations x^2 - 8*y^2 = 8*k+1 and x^2 - 8*y^2 = -8*k+1 have no solutions. - _Robert Israel_, Apr 08 2019
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
